>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
1<sup>re</sup> Ã©dition
<<===== RESULT =====<<



>>===== CSL =====>>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<style default-locale="fr-FR" class="note" version="1.0" xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl">
  <info>
    <title/>
    <id/>
    <updated>2016-06-13T07:41:51+00:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation et-al-use-first="2" et-al-min="3" et-al-use-last="true">
    <layout>
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <number variable="edition" form="ordinal"/>
        <label variable="edition"/>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
  <bibliography>
    <layout>
      <text value="Test!"/>
      <text value="qq"/>
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "edition": "1", 
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
